We are revolutionizing the car industry, saving clients 10-15% on average over traditional dealerships.  Our approach is simple.  We start with your criteria, and search wholesale cars to find the perfect one for you.  Then we ship it to your doorstep.  

CarLink charges a flat fee for our service, unlike traditional dealerships that tack-on fee after fee.  We also believe in transparency, which is why we show our clients all the pricing details  including the price we paid for the car.  Sound too good to be true?  Hold on, it gets better.
